AzusaFish:StaticShield.NAME: Static Shield
AzusaFish:StaticShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain !M! additional Block for each Spark you have.

AzusaFish:DetonationProtocol.NAME: Detonation Protocol
AzusaFish:DetonationProtocol.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Remove all Current Mark. Deal !M! damage for each stack removed.

AzusaFish:DiffusedCurrent.NAME: Diffused Current
AzusaFish:DiffusedCurrent.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Channel 1 Spark.

AzusaFish:ArtsStorm.NAME: Arts Storm
AzusaFish:ArtsStorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deal !M! additional damage for each stack of Precision.

AzusaFish:FullPowerMode.NAME: Full Power Mode
AzusaFish:FullPowerMode.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Precision. At the end of your turn, lose !M! Precision.

AzusaFish:Beacon.NAME: Beacon
AzusaFish:Beacon.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Current Mark. NL Draw 1 card.

AzusaFish:DroneRecycle.NAME: Drone Recycle
AzusaFish:DroneRecycle.DESCRIPTION: Remove (without Evoking) your first Spark. Gain [E] [E].
AzusaFish:DroneRecycle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove (without Evoking) your first Spark. Gain [E] [E]. NL Draw 1 card.

AzusaFish:InductiveChain.NAME: Inductive Chain
AzusaFish:InductiveChain.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the target has Current Mark, apply !M! Current Mark to ALL other enemies.

AzusaFish:Meltdown.NAME: Meltdown
AzusaFish:Meltdown.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] . Spark damage is doubled this turn. NL At the start of your next turn, lose all Sparks (without Evoking) and lose [E] .

AzusaFish:CrystallineShine.NAME: Crystalline Shine
AzusaFish:CrystallineShine.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Apply !M! Current Mark to ALL enemies. Trigger the passive effect of all Sparks.
